item.title: The beginning
item.description: Well, hello there and welcome to my new blog. I am Gustavo Leite, a computer science student who loves to teach and share thoughts. Although I indent to use this blog to talk mainly about programming and computing, I may occasionally talk about my life and hobbies, let’s see. Thanks for passing by! ðŸ‘‹

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Gustavo Leite! A computer science PhD student at the Institute of Computing from Campinas State University (Unicamp) in Brazil. I am currently doing research on high-performance computing and parallel programming models. I am also interested in compilers, programming languages, and computer architecture.
